attributes.action: Nullify petition to stop Trump's State Visit, the Queen must be free to Decide.
attributes.additional_details: The Queen should be free to invite US President Donald Trump to the United Kingdom for an official State Visit. She has met with many controversial leaders at Buckingham palace in the past, Murgarbi, Bashar al-Assad, Mobutu Sese Seko to name but a few, in fact the Queen has found herself at close quarters with some of the most feared heads of states and leaders some with questionable objectives, banning Trump would be Hypocrisy.
attributes.background: Donald Trump should be allowed to enter the UK in his capacity as head of the US Government, and the official State Visit should be upheld as Her Majesty the Queen should not be exposed to hypocrisy.
